import { useSelector } from "react-redux" import { useDispatch } from "react-redux" import { setNotificationCenter } from "../store/slices/slice" import Notification from "./Notification" import { useEffect,useState } from "react" import { getNotifications } from "../api_s/getNotifications" function NotificationCenter(){ const [notifications,setNotifications]=useState(null) const notificationCenter=useSelector(state=>state.global.notificationCenter) const dispatch=useDispatch() useEffect(()=>{ getNotifications().then(data=>setNotifications(data)) .catch(err=>console.error(err)) console.log(notifications) },[]) return(

Notification Center

dispatch(setNotificationCenter(!notificationCenter))}/>
    {notifications&& notifications.map(e=>) }
) } export default NotificationCenter
